reviewText: I think the approach of using one camera has limitations. Some of the strokes couldn't be viewed because the client's body blocked the shot. Close ups are needed in this type of video for clarity and understanding.

I am a massage student and often my thumbs and wrists hurt after a long day.
This movie has given me lots of tools to save my thumbs by using my forearms.
In my college this technique wasn't really taught so I really loved this educational tool and I will most definitely incorporate it into my massage techniques.
The video was value for money and covers back, arm and legs.
